bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with kou wai 口喎 , wryness of the mouth, brought forth by wind evil stroke. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 quoting Yang shi jia cang fang 楊氏家藏方 1: a recipe 治 口眼喎斜 , “To cure wryness of mouth and eyes”, writes: 白附子…風喎，同僵 蠶、全蠍研末，酒服 , “ Bai fu zi …[cures] wind wryness . Powderize together with dead silkworms and complete scorpions, and ingest with wine”.
